newsitem.title: USA: RAC Financial files to offer 5 mln shares.
newsitem.headline: RAC Financial files to offer 5 mln shares.

text.p: RAC Financial Group Inc said Monday it had filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission for an offering of up to 5.0 million shares.
The filing said 4.2 million shares will be sold by the company and 800,000 will be sold by stockholders.
After the offering, outstanding shares will total 31,697,758, the filing said.
RAC and the selling stockholders have granted the underwriters a 30-day over-allotment option on up to 750,000 additional shares.
The offering will be made through Bear, Stearns & Co Inc, Keefe, Bruyette & Woods Inc, Montgomery Securities, and Prudential Securities Inc, the company said.
The Dallas company said net proceeds will be used to reduce outstanding debt and for general corporate purposes.
RAC is a specialized consumer finance company that operates under the trade name FIRSTPLUS. The company originates, purchases, services and sells consumer finance receivables.
